Gnome.synopsis: A dwarf and a gnome from the Lower City are food shopping in wyrm's crossing. The gnome is panic shopping, convinced there is going to be siege, shortages, etc. (Very covid buying all the toilet paper it's a doomsday kind of vibe). Her dwarven girlfriend is doing her best to reign her in, while also trying to be understanding.
Gnome.how_to_trigger: - Go to 1; 47; 102- Talk to the Gnome

AD_FoodChat.synopsis: A dwarf and a gnome from the Lower City are food shopping in wyrm's crossing. The gnome is panic shopping, convinced there is going to be siege, shortages, etc. (Very covid buying all the toilet paper it's a doomsday kind of vibe). Her dwarven girlfriend is doing her best to reign her in, while also trying to be understanding.
AD_FoodChat.how_to_trigger: - Go to 1; 47; 102- Dialogue should start automatically.

Dwarf.synopsis: A dwarf and a gnome from the Lower City are food shopping in wyrm's crossing. The gnome is panic shopping, convinced there is going to be siege, shortages, etc. (Very covid buying all the toilet paper it's a doomsday kind of vibe). Her dwarven girlfriend is doing her best to reign her in, while also trying to be understanding.
Dwarf.how_to_trigger: - Go to 1; 47; 102- Talk to the dwarf

Gnome_0.speaker: Neno Quilltop
Gnome_0.text: Why is everyone acting so normal? The Absolute's armies are coming - we need to stock up!
Gnome_0.context: NodeContext: nearly bouncing with anxious energy.

Gnome_1.speaker: Neno Quilltop
Gnome_1.text: Ham, cheese, fruit, veg... I'm forgetting something. What am I forgetting?!
Gnome_1.context: NodeContext: nearly bouncing with anxious energy.

AD_FoodChat_0.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_0.text: Ten loaves of bread? Are you sure?

AD_FoodChat_11.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_11.text: The neighbours said they had fifteen!

AD_FoodChat_10.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_10.text: The neighbours are talking out of their arses. Besides our pantry is full.

AD_FoodChat_6.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_6.text: What if there's food shortages? Rationing? We can't leave anything to chance!

AD_FoodChat_5.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_5.text: If it'll make you feel better, than fine - fifteen loaves it is.
AD_FoodChat_5.context: NodeContext: a sigh - doesn't want to, but knows her partner is so panicked that nothing will calm her

AD_FoodChat_3.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_3.text: Apples, loaves, butter - honey! We should stock up.
AD_FoodChat_3.context: NodeContext: nearly bouncing on her heels with nervous energy

AD_FoodChat_14.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_14.text: Honey is a luxury. We don't need honey.

AD_FoodChat_9.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_9.text: But I love honey. I love honey so much.

AD_FoodChat_8.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_8.text: Woah, slow down, sweetie. Take a deep breath for me, yeah?

AD_FoodChat_12.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_12.text: We should hit Rivington next - they might have something we've forgotten.
AD_FoodChat_12.context: NodeContext: nearly bouncing on her heels with nervous energy

AD_FoodChat_4.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_4.text: I don't know - but I'll know it when I see it!

AD_FoodChat_1.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_1.text: Let's just stick to the list.

AD_FoodChat_2.speaker: Neno Quilltop
AD_FoodChat_2.text: If the Absolute's armies lay siege, they won't care about a stupid list. We have to be prepared!

AD_FoodChat_7.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
AD_FoodChat_7.text: Whatever we need, we can get in Wyrm's Crossing.

Dwarf_0.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
Dwarf_0.text: No need to crowd me. There's enough food in this city to feed an army, Fist, Absolute, or otherwise.
Dwarf_0.context: NodeContext: a sigh, a little frustrated

Dwarf_1.speaker: Kali Hammerhand
Dwarf_1.text: If you're here to shop, just buy what's needed, all right? Some people are panic-buying. Let's not add to the problem.
Dwarf_1.context: NodeContext: her gf is panic buying. Feeling guilty.
